statusMessages.messageHtml:
Thank you for using HPE NPS Analytics!

We wanted to inform you that we have recently enhanced the NPS analysis process. To take advantage of this improved analysis process, please re-create the index and re-upload your dataset below.

If you do not have the required quota, you can safely delete any old NPS indexes at havenondemand.com/account/text-indexes. Once you have at least 12 resource units available, you should create a new index using the button below.
